revision.comment: Reverted 1 edit by [[Special:Contributions/2402:3A80:B2F:F021:2AB6:C7AD:43EC:8493|2402:3A80:B2F:F021:2AB6:C7AD:43EC:8493]] ([[User talk:2402:3A80:B2F:F021:2AB6:C7AD:43EC:8493|talk]]) don't add official name in wiki link ([[Wikipedia:Twinkle|TW]])
revision.text:
{{Use dmy dates|date = September 2019}} {{Use Indian English|date = September 2019}} {{For|Vidhan Sabha|Bikapur (Assembly constituency)}} '''Bikapur''' is a Tehsil and Nagar Panchayat of [[Faizabad district]] of [[Uttar Pradesh]] state of India.{{Cite web|url=https://m.mapsofindia.com/villages/uttar-pradesh/faizabad/bikapur/|title=Villages in Bikapur Tehsil , Faizabad, Uttar Pradesh|website=m.mapsofindia.com|access-date=2019-09-10}} {{Infobox settlement | name = Bikapur | official_name = | settlement_type = Town | subdivision_type = Country | subdivision_name = {{Flag|India}} | subdivision_type1 = State | subdivision_name1 = [[Uttar Pradesh]] | subdivision_type2 = District | subdivision_name2 = [[Faizabad district|Faizabad]] | population_as_of = 2011 | population_total = 14,453 }} ==Demographics== In 2011 total population of Bikapur 14,453.{{Cite web|url=https://ourhero.in/cities/bikapur-801111|title=Bikapur, Bikapur City Polpulation and Location {{!}} Ourhero.In|website=ourhero.in|access-date=2019-09-10}}
==Tourist Places== There are many nearest tourist places like as Bharatkund(6km), Ayodhya(20km), Chhapiya(56km), Allahabad(137km), Varanasi(250km) and Kushinagar(250km). ==Rivers== There are two rivers passes near Bikapur like as Ghaghra locally name as Saryu Ayodhya and Gomti Sultanpur. ==Transport== Bikapur is well connected with Ayodhya(Faizabad)-Gonda-Sultanpur-Pratapgarh-Allahabad By NH 330A '''Air.''' Nearest Domestic Airports are Ayodhya Airport {20 km(under construction)}, Allahabad (150 km) and Gorakhpur (150 km) and Nearest International Airports are Lucknow (150 km) and Varanasi ( 200 km). '''Rail.''' The Indian Railways network connects Faizabad, Chaure Bazar, Sultanpur, Allahabad. '''Road.''' Bikapur has good road connectivity with Ayodhya(Faizabad), Chaure Bazar, Pratapgarh, Sultanpur, Allahabad By NH 330A. ==References== {{Reflist}} {{Faizabad district}} [[Category:Cities and towns in Faizabad district]] {{Faizabad-geo-stub}}
